languages.text: "Служить Омниссии. Наш жизненный Цикл слишком долго подвергался износу, и я инициирую его обновление. Это будет временем великого страдания и великих жертв, но так велит анализ. Флот Осознание готов нести благую весть в Империум".

"Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Служить Омниссии. Наш жизненный Цикл слишком долго подвергался износу, и я инициирую его обновление. Это будет временем великого страдания и великих жертв, но так велит анализ. Флот Осознание готов нести благую весть в Империум".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我要侍奉欧姆尼塞亚。我们生命的循环已经被磨耗得太久，我要更新这个循环。这个过程会带来巨大的痛苦与牺牲，但分析结果要求我们这么做。真理开拓者舰队已经准备向帝国传达这个好消息了。”
languages.original_text: "Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “我要侍奉欧姆尼塞亚。我们生命的循环已经被磨耗得太久，我要更新这个循环。这个过程会带来巨大的痛苦与牺牲，但分析结果要求我们这么做。真理开拓者舰队已经准备向帝国传达这个好消息了。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Servir al Omnissiah. El ciclo de nuestras vidas se ha desgastado durante demasiado tiempo y me corresponde iniciar la renovación. Será un tiempo de gran sufrimiento y de grandes sacrificios, pero es lo que dicta el análisis. La Flota de Conocimiento está lista para traer las buenas noticias al Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Servir al Omnissiah. El ciclo de nuestras vidas se ha desgastado durante demasiado tiempo y me corresponde iniciar la renovación. Será un tiempo de gran sufrimiento y de grandes sacrificios, pero es lo que dicta el análisis. La Flota de Conocimiento está lista para traer las buenas noticias al Imperium».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「万機神に仕えよ。我らの生のサイクルは、あまりにも長い間摩耗してきた。それは大きな苦しみと犠牲の時であろうが、ここに分析を命ずる。コグニサンス艦隊は、帝国に吉報を伝える準備ができている」
languages.original_text: "Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神に仕えよ。我らの生のサイクルは、あまりにも長い間摩耗してきた。それは大きな苦しみと犠牲の時であろうが、ここに分析を命ずる。コグニサンス艦隊は、帝国に吉報を伝える準備ができている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Dem Omnissiah dienen. Der Kreislauf unserer Leben ist schon zu lange ausgetreten, ich werde seine Erneuerung einleiten. Es wird eine Zeit großen Leids und großer Opfer sein, doch die Analyse gebietet es. Die Erkenntnisflotte ist bereit, dem Imperium die frohe Kunde zu überbringen."
languages.original_text: "Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Dem Omnissiah dienen. Der Kreislauf unserer Leben ist schon zu lange ausgetreten, ich werde seine Erneuerung einleiten. Es wird eine Zeit großen Leids und großer Opfer sein, doch die Analyse gebietet es. Die Erkenntnisflotte ist bereit, dem Imperium die frohe Kunde zu überbringen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Servir l'Omnimessie. Le Cycle de nos vies se détériore depuis bien trop longtemps, aussi vais-je déclencher son renouvellement. Nous connaîtrons une période de grande souffrance et de grands sacrifices, mais l'analyse ne laisse aucun doute quant à la marche à suivre. La Flotte de la Connaissance est prête à porter la bonne nouvelle à l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Servir l'Omnimessie. Le Cycle de nos vies se détériore depuis bien trop longtemps, aussi vais-je déclencher son renouvellement. Nous connaîtrons une période de grande souffrance et de grands sacrifices, mais l'analyse ne laisse aucun doute quant à la marche à suivre. La Flotte de la Connaissance est prête à porter la bonne nouvelle à l'Imperium. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."

languages.text: "Hermesih'e hizmet edeceğim. Yaşam Döngümüz epeydir aşınmış vaziyette. Döngü'nün yenilenmesini başlatacağım. Büyük acıların yaşandığı, büyük fedakârlıkların yapıldığı bir döneme gireceğiz ancak analizler bunu emrediyor. Malumat Filosu, güzel haberleri İmparatorluk'a taşımaya hazır."
languages.original_text: "Serve the Omnissiah. The Cycle of our lives has been worn down for too long, and I will initiate its renewal. It will be a time of great suffering and great sacrifice, but thus commands the analysis. The Cognisance Fleet is ready to bear the good tidings to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'e hizmet edeceğim. Yaşamlarımızın döngüsü uzunca bir süredir aşınmış durumda ve ben de onun yenilenmesini başlatacağım. Büyük acıların yaşandığı, büyük fedakârlıkların yapıldığı bir döneme gireceğiz ancak analizler bunu emrediyor. Malumat Filosu güzel haberleri İmparatorluk'a taşımaya hazır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
